articles.description: In a Wednesday video, health workers warned that hospital capacity and their mental health were straining under a new surge of COVID-19 cases.
articles.content: As California struggles to deal with a spike in case numbers and an alarming number of COVID-19 deaths, frontline workers in the state are begging people to stay home and not gather for the holidays.… [+3195 chars]
